author: Levu Work
comment: UPDATED: I made a full reset of my phone and just realized something... Are you crazy? You really want to have success with an app that DOESN'T SAVE THE LOCATIONS IN AN ONLINE ACCOUNT?!?  How am I gonna get all my saved locations back ? Sorry but this is of no use for me as it is.
title: Looks very promising and also looks good. A dark theme would be nice.
